Uses of Interface
fr.upmc.components.connectors.DataConnectorI

  • Packages that use DataConnectorI 
    Package Description
    fr.upmc.components.connectors
    Hierarchy of connector objects to assemble components.
    fr.upmc.components.ports
    Hierarchy of ports to expose interfaces of components and interconnect them.

    • Uses of DataConnectorI in fr.upmc.components.connectors

      Classes in fr.upmc.components.connectors that implement DataConnectorI 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractDataConnector
      The class AbstractDataConnector partially implements a basic data connector between components exchanging data rather than calling each others services.
      class  ActiveDataConnector
      The class ActiveBasicDataConnector partially implements an active connector that can be used to connect qctive components in a synchronised way, on a mix of active and passive components using a full or partial pull mode.
      class  DataConnector
      The class DataConnector partially implements a basic data connector where components call each others using plain Java method calls only.
      Methods in fr.upmc.components.connectors that return DataConnectorI 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected DataConnectorI AbstractDataConnector.thisConnector() 

    • Uses of DataConnectorI in fr.upmc.components.ports

      Methods in fr.upmc.components.ports with parameters of type DataConnectorI 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void DataInboundPortI.setConnector(DataConnectorI c)
      set the connector of the port, establishing the connection with a client.
      void AbstractDataInboundPort.setConnector(DataConnectorI c)
      Contract pre c !
      void DataInboundPortI.unsetConnector(DataConnectorI c)
      unset the connector of the port, cutting the connection with a client.
      void AbstractDataInboundPort.unsetConnector(DataConnectorI c)
      Contract pre c !
